sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"推断"之意。
means: infer ： 指从已提供的论据或从已接受的前提出发而推断出的结论。
deduce ： 指有充分根据的推论，也指逻辑学上的演绎。
conclude ： 指得出符合逻辑的结论。
gather ： 指从听到的情况推测、判定。
judge ： 多指经过仔细鉴定或评价之后作出决断。

sentence.Network_en: People usually infer an unknown fact from a known fact.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们通常从已知的事实中推断未知的事实.

sentence.Network_en: From this study we can reasonably infer that this behaviour is inherited.
sentence.Network_cn: 根据这项研究我们可以合理地推断出这种行为是遗传的.

sentence.Network_en: What do you infer from the voting figures?
sentence.Network_cn: 你从选举数字中可以推出什么结论 呢 ?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... differentiate v 使有差别；分化 infer v 推理，推断 inferable a 可推知的.
高中英语单词表 ... infinitive n. (动词)不定式 infer vt. 推论，推断；猜想 industry n. 工业，产业；勤劳，勤奋；工业界.
英语构词法记忆单词研究 ... infatuate 使(人)迷恋 infer 推断出,推知,暗示 infiltrate 渗入,浸透.
690个英语四级高频词汇 ... disturb vt. 打搅，妨碍 248. infer v. 推论，推断 249. moist a. 潮湿 251.

统计学英中词录 ... Statistical graph, 统计图 Statistical inference 统计推论 / 统计推断 Statistical table 统计表 / 统计表.
统计学词汇收集 ... Statistical computing 统计计算 Statistical inference 统计推论 Stochastic processes 随机过程.
心理学词汇(psychology) 3 ... 推理 inference， reasoning 演绎推理 deductive inference 归纳推理 inductive inference.
心理学专业词汇翻译辞典 - MBA智库文档 ... inductive effect 诱导效应 inductive inference 归纳推理 inductive method 归纳法.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'bring about, inflict'): from Latin inferre 'bring in, bring about' (in medieval Latin 'deduce'), from in- 'into' + ferre 'bring'

encyclopedia.content: 形容发帖too old或者手慢，引申为形容某人反应迟钝 流传范围：北大未名bbs 起源：一个名为infer的id总是转载很old的帖子，或者转载热门贴总慢别人一拍。久而久之，人们就用infer来代指那些tooold的贴或手慢贴。 未名官方解释： infer 专指在wm上反应比别人慢半拍，发帖比较土，经常说大家都知道的内容的一类人。 以infer为代表ID 其中r的个数按情况而定，类比于tooooooooooold中的o toold 即too old 专指在wm上经常转载一些老掉牙

entry.def: If you infer that something is the case, you decide that it is true on the basis of information that you already have.

example.ex: I inferred from what she said that you have not been well...
example.tran: 我从她的话语里推断你身体一直不太好。

example.ex: By measuring the motion of the galaxies in a cluster, astronomers can infer the cluster's mass.
example.tran: 通过测量星系在一个星系团内的运动,天文学家们可以推定这个星系团的质量。

entry.tran: 暗示,暗指,意味着(许多人认为此用法不正确)
entry.def: Some people use infer to mean 'imply', but many people consider this use to be incorrect.

example.ex: The police inferred that they found her behaviour rather suspicious.
example.tran: 警方暗示他们发现她行为非常可疑。

means.word_mean: 1. reason by deduction; establish by deduction
2. draw from specific cases for more general cases

sentences.sentence: "He guessed the right number of beans in the jar and won the prize"
"I understand you have no previous experience?"

auth_sentence.content: Many infrared dealers basically infer that you sweat fat.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many infrared dealers basically infer that you sweat fat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many infrared dealers basically infer that you sweat fat.

auth_sentence.content: I infer from your writing that you are angry.
auth_sentence.res_content: I infer from your writing that you are angry.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I infer from your writing that you are angry.

auth_sentence.content: You might infer that Christians in Britain are persecuted.
auth_sentence.res_content: You might infer that Christians in Britain are persecuted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You might infer that Christians in Britain are persecuted.

stems_affixes.word_buile: aqui水+fer带来,拿来+ous……的→带来水的
differ[v.不同]+ent表形容词→adj.不同的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 肥沃的,富饶的;能繁殖的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fert=fer带来,拿来+ile能……的→能带来粮食→肥沃的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有花的,开花的,多花的,花盛开的
stems_affixes.word_buile: flori=flor花+fer带来,拿来+ous……的→带来花→有花的
in不+different不同的→同与不同的"事不关已" →冷漠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能推理的, 能推论的
stems_affixes.word_buile: infer[v.推论,推断]+able能……的→adj.能推理的, 能推论的
infer[v.推论,推断]+ent+ial……的→adj.推论性的
odori=odor气味+fer带来,拿来+ous……的→带来气味的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可归[起]因于……的, 可归入……的; 与……有关的
stems_affixes.word_buile: refer[v.参考,查询;提到,引用,涉及;提交,上呈]+able能……的→能提到的,能找到原因的→可归于……
suffer[v.受苦]+able能……的→adj.可容忍的,可忍耐的
transfer[n.&v.转移;转换;转让;过户;迁移;改乘]+able能……的→adj.可转让的
aqui水+fer带来,拿来→n.含水土层, 蓄水层
confer[v.商讨;授予,颁给[勋衔,学位等]]+ence表名词→n.[正式]会议;讨论,商谈

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给予, 商量, 授予
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+fer带来,拿来+ment表名词→共同带来东西→给予[奖品等]
coni松果+fer带来,拿来→带来松果的树→针叶树

stems_affixes.value_cn: 针叶树的,松类的,结球果的
stems_affixes.word_buile: conifer[n.针叶树]+ous……的→n.针叶树的,松类的,结球果的
defer敬从+ence表名词→n.敬意,尊重
defer推迟+ment表名词→n.推迟;延迟
differ[v.不同]+ence表名词→n.不同
fer带来,拿来+ry状态,性质→带来带去
fertile[adj.肥沃的,富饶的;能繁殖的]+ity表名词→n.肥沃,丰饶
fertilize[v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃]+er表名词→n.[fertiliser]肥料
of一再+fer带来,拿来→一再带来→提供
offer[v.提供,提议,出现 n.出价,提议,意图]+ing表名词→n.报盘,提供的货物
prefer[v.[to]更喜欢,宁愿]+ence表名词→n.[for,to]偏爱,喜爱;优惠;优先选择
pro向前+ffer=fer带来,拿来→带到前面去→贡献出来
refer[v.参考,查询;提到,引用,涉及;提交,上呈]+ee人→被双方提及的人→裁判

stems_affixes.value_cn: 提及,涉及;参考,参考书目;证明书[人]
stems_affixes.word_buile: refer[v.参考,查询;提到,引用,涉及;提交,上呈]+ence表名词→n.提及,涉及;参考,参考书目;证明书[人]
refer[v.参考,查询;提到,引用,涉及;提交,上呈]+endum表名词→提出[候选人]→选举

stems_affixes.value_cn: 转移;转换;转让;过户;迁移;改乘
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans变换,交换+fer带→转移过去→转学,转移

stems_affixes.value_cn: 商讨;授予,颁给[勋衔,学位等]
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+fer带来,拿来→共同带来观点
de加强+fer带来,拿来→一再带来敬意
dif不同+fer带来→带来不同→不同
different[adj.不同的]+iate做→v.区分,区别;[使]不同
fer带来,拿来+ry状态,性质→带来带去
fertile[adj.肥沃的,富饶的;能繁殖的]+ize表动词→v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃
in进入+fer带来,拿来→带来[意义]→推断
of一再+fer带来,拿来→一再带来→提供
pre先+fer带来→预先就带来→更喜欢
pro向前+ffer=fer带来,拿来→带到前面去→贡献出来

stems_affixes.value_cn: 参考,查询;提到,引用,涉及;提交,上呈

suf下面+fer带→带到下面去→受苦

Sentence.sentence: We can infer from the passage that strong family and community ties can contribute to stable marriages.
What can be inferred from the last paragraph?
You can have a try, but as far as i know,he seldom accepts invitations from his employees Q: What can we infer about Mr
What can be inferred about the man?
What can we infer from the conversation?

means.word_mean: 推断, 推知, 推论, 猜想

sentences.en: From his remarks, I inferred that he hadn't enjoyed his holiday.
sentences.cn: 从他的话中我推断他的假期过得不愉快。

jushi.english: Men observe and infer in all sorts of ways.
jushi.chinese: 人们通过各个途径进行观察和推断。

jushi.english: We see smoke and infer fire.
jushi.chinese: 我们看到烟,从而推断有火。
